text: Suvra Mukherjee (September 17, 1940 - August 18, 2015) was the First Lady of India from 2012 until her death in 2015. She was the wife of Indian President Pranab Mukherjee from 1957 until her death in 2015. Mukherjee died of respiratory failure caused by lung cancer at a hospital in New Delhi, India, aged 74.Suvra Mukherjee, President Pranab Mukherjee's wife, passes away ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:People from New Delhi
title: Suvra Mukherjee
